column2: "Don Jr. fumes for 13 minutes after the Trump Organization is indicted: 'This is what Russia does'"
column5: 13 minutes of pure insanity for coked-out eldest spawn of the domestic terrorist that occupied the WH. Not surprising eldest spawn openly admits the guilt of his fat-ass father as if telling a bedtime story to his children. He doesn’t deny crimes committed point he tries to make is that it really isn’t that big of a deal given amount of money over 15 years!! Crime doesn’t matter when you have white privilege.
